articles.title: Australia's international borders will stay shut until 2022, Josh Frydenberg says - SBS News
articles.description: In an interview with SBS News, Josh Frydenberg said it's "vitally important" to continue following medical advice on reopening Australia's international borders.
articles.content:
Australia's international borders are unlikely to reopen until next year, with authorities saying they are "following the medical advice" and will only do so when it is deemed "safe".
